attributes.action: change the law to ensure that financial institutions, like building societies, do not immediately adopt the Bank of England lower rate for savers while introducing their own above Bank of England rate for mortgagees and other borrowers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It cannot be right that these people immediately reduce the interest rate for savers while increasing mortgage interest rates above the Bank of England rate for borrowers.  This is yet another stark example of rip off Britain!
